message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this price allows for a fair profit for both of us.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your pricing. However, I am only able to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I understand your position,  $13,000 is a bit lower than I can accept.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. This would be a fair price for both of us and allow us to finalize this deal. Let me know your thoughts.
